text: Éber Henrique Ferreira de Bessa or Éber Bessa for short (born 21 March 1992) is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Botafogo. ==Career== On 24 January 2015, Éber Bessa signed with Marítimo. On 5 May 2018, after over three years at the club, Bessa left Marítimo. ==External links== * ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Cruzeiro Esporte Clube players Category:Villa Nova Atlético Clube players Category:C.S. title: Éber Bessa
